content:
@Ana Trisovic and I created a draft issue yesterday and I just converted it to a full issue: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9442

I had a quick play with h5dump and HDFView and, yes, you can see the folders inside an HDF5 file. Needs more exploration.

Also, maybe "file hierarchy" don't capture enough. Maybe "contents" is better? There's all kinds of interesting stuff inside HDF5 files. :happy:
I just wrote a little Java code (using the library we added) that prints out the directories: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/issues/9442#issuecomment-1476919786
Looks great! Saw it on your screen yesterday :-P

Heh, thanks. I moved your other question to its own topic.

Also, if H5Web shows the file hierarchry, maybe we should to try to get it working.
Philip Durbin has marked this topic as resolved.
